body: Sarith, Sorry for the late reply. I tried your file and everything checks out well.  The sky looks as I would expect it: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sBaSmBgJy8xjZGieoSgcendN33vr33lOuy4lC7iWMaVwvjFXc*v*0ujByfe5JfoUG8t8AhQOH4z6PMHBFvHXo9WxcHSUs0wh/WorkingSky.JPG) The fact that the csv data has the same length of day for the whole year means that we get some weirdness around the eastern horizon (dark patches in the summer).  Still, everything seems good with your code. -Chris
